definitions.definition: A keen -edged knife of peculiar shape, used in shaving the hair from the face or other parts of the body.
Any tool or instrument designed for shaving.
The sharp tusk of a wild boar .
A conceptual device that allows one to shave away unlikely explanations for a phenomenon .

main_definition: A keen -edged knife of peculiar shape, used in shaving the hair from the face or other parts of the body.
secondary_definitions: Any tool or instrument designed for shaving.
The sharp tusk of a wild boar .
( philosophy ) A conceptual device that allows one to shave away unlikely explanations for a phenomenon .
